text: Kuweires Sharqi () is a town in eastern Aleppo Governorate, northwestern Syria, mostly known for the Kuweires Military Airbase to the northeast. Located on the Dayr Hafir Plain north of Lake Jabbul, some east of the city of Aleppo and west of Dayr Hafir, Kuweires Sharqi is the administrative center of Nahiya Kuweires Sharqi in Dayr Hafir District. In the 2004 census, it had a population of 3,129. Kuwayris Sharqi is the administrative center of Nahiya Kuweires Sharqi of the Dayr Hafir District. ==References==
title: Kuweires Sharqi
